errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

errors.accountNotFound: No account found with this email
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later
errors.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please try again in {seconds} seconds
errors.rateLimitedMinutes: Too many attempts. Please try again in {minutes} minutes

errors.expired: Telegram authentication expired. Please try again
errors.notLinked: This Telegram account is not linked to any user
errors.alreadyLinked: This Telegram account is already linked to another user

telegram.botLinkInvalid: Invalid login link. Please try again.
